name: mailpart
description: Specifies one part of a multipart e-mail message. Can only be used in the cfmail tag. You can use more than one cfmailpart tag within a cfmail tag

params.name: type
params.description: The MIME media type of the part

params.name: wraptext
params.description: Specifies the maximum line length, in characters of the mail text

params.name: charset
params.description: The character encoding in which the part text is encoded
